channel.title: Hamachi {NEED HELP}
channel.description: hey guys i want too get connection with hamachi but it wont its only reconnecting/resolving all the time and after a while it says i cant connect. anny1 can help me how too connect correctly too hamachi? i got a account and stuff but it justs stuck at the place where i told :confused:

item.title: Hamachi {NEED HELP}
item.dc:creator: @mattboy mattboy
item.description:
@mattboy wrote:

Hamachi:

If you would like a hamachi server then go to www.hamachi.cc

and scroll down until u click download

then choose your compute type (i.e. Windows, Mac OSX or Linux)

open up hamachi… go to the box at the side and click, create a new network (make a couple if its a popular server)

make the pass and easy one (recommended is 123)

then at the top it will say a couple of numbers starting with 5.
that is the hamachi ip people will need to connect to ur server!!

Now… when u are all set up, go into your servers files and search for runserver.bat

it will say starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 note( usually this port)

then open up moparscape and type in whatever username and password you want (this is the ones you will use to connect to ur server)

for YOUR IP you will type in 0.0.0.0 but the others will join the network and out in you no-ip or hamachi ip

~ thanks ~ hope this helped

Read full topic

item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:3, topic:65590”]also check what internet your using, if your using wireless try using a LAN connection Youll Have More Luck With It.
Thanks And Good Luck! ;)[/quote]

you dont need to repeat what people just said… so you should stop…

item.title: Hamachi {NEED HELP}
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Sometimes Too Many People Try To Log on to hamachi at Once, Leave It For About 15-30 mins and try again, also check what internet your using, if your using wireless try using a LAN connection Youll Have More Luck With It.
Thanks And Good Luck!

Read full topic
